Khojā Lāljībhāī Devrāj, Khojā Siñdhā Ćhāpākhānû
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pīr Ṣadr ad-Dīn, Pīr Imām Shāh.
Published for the Imami Ismaili School (nisāl).
Covers missing, binding in poor condition.
Includes Index (pp. 63-64) and list of sale publications of the Khojā Siñdhī Printing Press and an announcement of the publication of other works.
MS Indic 2534. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
In various Indic languages in Khojki script.
With: Ārtī / Pīr Ṣadr ad-Dīn ; Tartībh:dhoā:paṛaṇjī ; Dhûā:vakhat:treajī ; Ćoghaḍīā:sāñjījā:pañj / Pīr Ṣadr ad-Dīn, Pīr Imām Shāh.
